headline: KXI Is Anchored by Dividend Kings That Quietly Returned 18% This Year
summary: KXI pays a 2.2% dividend yield by owning shares in the world’s most recognizable consumer staples companies, passing that income through to investors each quarter. With nearly 20 years of operating history and a portfolio built around household names, it has earned a reputation as a conservative income vehicle for retirees. But a 2.2% yield ...
